<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma2

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.00

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> local

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Unit Inventory

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Removes all special items from the unit.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> [[removeAllItems]] unit

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> unit: [[Object]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> Nothing

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[removeAllItems]] unitName;</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[removeAllWeapons]], [[removeMagazines]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class='command_description'>
<comment><!-- Note Section BEGIN -->
</comment>
<dd class="notedate">Posted on June 18, 2013 - 15:35</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Druid|Druid]]</dt>
<dd class="note">Arma 3, version 0.70 - removes only items listed by command [[items]].

<comment><!-- Note Section END -->
